channel.description: Recent content in git on gruchalski.com

item.title: Git: chopping out part of the repo into a separate repo
item.description: I had to cut out cookbooks/nodejs from the develop into a separate repository and move develop to master. The problem is, there is a git repository called XYZ with the following structure: cookbooks nodejs ... mysql ... other_stuff ... and following branches: refs/heads/master refs/heads/develop I had to cut out cookbooks/nodejs from the develop into a separate repository and move develop to master.
